```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library("ggplot2")
library(readxl)
DAC <- read_excel("DAC.xlsx")
names(DAC)[4] <- "DAC"
```

```{r}
DAC$Threshold0.4 <- "y"
n <- 0
for( i in 1:nrow(DAC)){
  if(DAC[i,4] >= .4){
    DAC[i, 6] <- "RON"
    n <- n + 1
  }else if(DAC[i,4] <= -.4){
    DAC[i, 6] <- "RON"
    n <- n + 1    
  }else{
    DAC[i, 6] <- "Not RON"
  }
}
n
# 103 Possible RONs
ggplot(DAC, aes(DAC, fill = Threshold0.4)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = .025) + xlab("Direction of Activity Change (10A - 231)") + ggtitle("Identify Readouts Based on Direction of Activity Change Threshold of 0.4")
```

```{r}
DAC$SignThreshold <- "0"

j <- 0
for( i in 1:nrow(DAC)){
  if((DAC[i,2] > 0) & (DAC[i, 3] <0)){
    DAC[i, 8] <- "RON"
    j<- j+1
  }else if((DAC[i,2] < 0) & (DAC[i, 3] > 0)){
    DAC[i, 8] <- "RON" 
    j <- j + 1
  }else{
    DAC[i, 8] <- "Not RON"
  }
}
j
#35 possible RONs
ggplot(DAC, aes(DAC, fill = SignThreshold)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = .025) + xlab("Direction of Activity Change (10A - 231)") + ggtitle("Identify Readouts Based on Positive Compared to Negative Numbers")
```
